column1: Halfred Greenhand was the son of Holman the greenhanded.
Halfred was a gardener like his father
column2: and the first to use his fathers nickname as a family name. He had one son
column3: whom he named after his father: Holman Greenhand was born in .

column1: The name comes from Old English healfrēad "half-red
column2: reddish" or from healfrǣd "half counsel".Jim Allan
